content.statement: vascular:aortic:taaa-002-extent-iv is a fundamental concept in Health-Sciences Medicine Surgery Vascular Pathology Aortic that provides essential knowledge for understanding related topics and clinical/practical applications.

clinical_pearls: Extent IV has the best prognosis of all TAAA types
CSF drainage is recommended for spinal protection despite lower paraplegia risk
Fenestrated EVAR increasingly used for Extent IV when anatomy suitable
